From: Terry Barlow <twb176@...>

::RebelYell::
RebelYell saw that his pistols were being absolutely
useless. He decided that his only chance was to
attempt to make a run for the Armory. He ran inside,
down the corridor and into armory. He grabbed the
first weapons he saw,a large chain gun and a semi
automatic laser rifle. He ran back out, activated his
jet pack, and took off after the jet bot. He fired 25
rounds from his chain gun and 4 shots from the laser
rifle at the jet's engines.
